EmailTemplate.name: 2014 Get Connected - Test get ahead
EmailTemplate.subject: Have you heard about Get Connected?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
Have you heard about Get Connected?
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We wanted to let you know that Get Connected is working alongside NCS with The Challenge to give you a dedicated, confidential helpline on 0808 801 0300.
To find out more about Get Connected or other ways to get in touch click here - you can contact them about absolutely anything that's on your mind.
Yours sincerely,
NCS with The Challenge
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Â© The Challenge Network.
You are receiving this email because you opted to subscribe for communications from The Challenge.
